sense.def: Illness Sign of difficult breathing. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry gang tie 鋼鐵：主金瘡，煩滿熱中，胸膈 氣塞，食不化 , “It controls wounds inflicted by metal objects, vexation, a feeling of fullness, and heated center, qi blockage in the chest and diaphragm, and an inability to digest food”. Qi san 氣散 , qi dispersion [5]

Etiological Agent. Pathological Mechanism of qi dispersion which in turn may cause disease. For example, a dispersion of the spleen and stomach qi may result in intestinal efflux and prolapse of the rectum. A dispersion of lung qi may result in lung distension and pain. Qi xiao liang fang 奇效良方 16: 怒則氣逆，喜則氣散，悲則氣消 , “Anger results in qi counterflow. Joy results in qi dispersion . Grief results in qi dissolution”.
